languages.text: "Это их семейные дела, пусть разбираются сами".
languages.translation_comment:

Никого не казним
Сцена без весов

languages.text: "It is their family affair. Let them handle it."
languages.original_text: "Это их семейные дела, пусть разбираются сами".

traits.locale_text: "It is their family affair. Let them handle it."
"It is their family affair. Let them handle it."
"It is their family affair. Let them handle it."
"It is their family affair. Let them handle it."
"It is their family affair. Let them handle it."
"It is their family affair. Let them handle it."

languages.text: "Das ist Angelegenheit ihrer Familie. Lass sie das regeln."
languages.original_text: "It is their family affair. Let them handle it."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist Angelegenheit ihrer Familie. Lass sie das regeln."

languages.text: « Il s'agit d'une affaire de famille. Qu'ils règlent leurs problèmes entre eux. »
languages.original_text: "It is their family affair. Let them handle it."

traits.locale_text: « Il s'agit d'une affaire de famille. Qu'ils règlent leurs problèmes entre eux. »

languages.text: “清官难断家务事，让他们自己想办法解决吧。”
languages.original_text: "It is their family affair. Let them handle it."

traits.locale_text: “清官难断家务事，让他们自己想办法解决吧。”

languages.text: «Es un asunto familiar. Que lo resuelvan en familia».
languages.original_text: "It is their family affair. Let them handle it."

traits.locale_text: «Es un asunto familiar. Que lo resuelvan en familia».

languages.text: 「それは彼らの家族の問題だ。彼らに任せよう」
languages.original_text: "It is their family affair. Let them handle it."

traits.locale_text: 「それは彼らの家族の問題だ。彼らに任せよう」

languages.text: "Aile meselesi sonuçta... Ne hâlleri varsa görsünler."
languages.original_text: "It is their family affair. Let them handle it."

traits.locale_text: "Aile meselesi sonuçta... Ne hâlleri varsa görsünler."
